name: Combatron: Project Phoenix
description:
The much-anticipated action game based on the hit Filipino comicbook is now here!

In a world without Combatron...

The malevolent space tyrant, Death Metal, suddenly emerges to be the primary threat on Earth. He enlisted dangerous space warriors to wreak havoc and destruction all the while trying to revive ancient space warriors who made Earth their battlefield eons ago.

As the leader of Earth's remaining line of defense, Komikus, loses hope, a sudden anomaly in the fabric of time and space suddenly made its presence felt...

It's now or never. Basagan na ng bakal!

Combatron: Project Phoenix is a fast-paced, "multi-tiered fighting game" wherein Combatron goes head-to-head with six of the classic villains in the 90s comicbook.

Punch, dash, and teleport your way to eight levels battling your way to face Death Metal to reveal a deeper purpose for his mysterious actions!

Also offers a glimpse of PHASE 2 (A future DLC) -- which includes the winners of the "Design Your Own Boss Contest" and a new gameplay mode (story mode)!
